name: Preclusion of title-related claims Individual Native Hawaiians
text:
Preclusion of title-related claims.  Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to affect title, or conveyance of title, or place a cloud upon title, to any lands in the State, including but not limited to lands which were, are, or may have been Hawaiian home lands. [L Sp 1995, c 14, §16]
Note
  Hawaiian home lands trust; resolution of controversies.  L Sp 1995, c 14.
